title: Understanding van der Waals Constant 'a'
text: Consider which property of gas molecules the van der Waals constant 'a' might relate to. Think about how it might be influenced by the size of the gas molecules or the strength of their intermolecular forces.

title: Interactions between Gas Molecules
text: Gases with larger or more polarizable molecules might have stronger intermolecular attractions. How could this affect the constant 'a'?

title: Consider the Nature of the Gases
text: Think about how hydrogen fluoride (HF) differs from diatomic hydrogen (H2) or fluorine (F2) in terms of molecular interaction.

title: Molecular Composition Influence
text: Which gas might have a different molecular structure that could lead to stronger van der Waals attractions?
